text: Thomas L. Steffen (9 July 1930 â€“ 1 September 2020) was an American politician and lawyer. He was the Chief Supreme Court Justice in the state of Nevada from 1982 to 1997. He was nominated by Governor Robert List. He studied at George Washington University where he graduated from in 1964. He began working in Bureau of Naval Weapons. Steffen died on 1 September 2020 at the age of 90.Thomas L.
